quagga.input.body:
Dan,
Can we get a report which details by group:  The PV of the book with the 
current system vs the PV of the book using the correct discounting 
methodology?
We can provide to Scott and Jeff for them to start reviewing and discussing 
with commercial the potential impact.

Thanks. Sheila




Daniel Falcone@ENRON
